name: Volt
description: Volt is a vintage-inspired oscilloscope-themed robot belonging to the WebtrES club. With its classic box design and retroConsole buttons, it brings a nostalgic charm to the modern era of technology. Equipped with soldier-like arms and legs, Volt is capable of withstanding various challenges. Its classic screen is perfect for displaying intricate waveforms and data analysis. Additionally, Volt is adorned with a helmet addon for enhanced protection and functionality.
